column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Very good steak and ambience
column2: but service was rather poor.  First
column3: I sat down and my chair was completely soaked in water.  The person before must have spilled an entire drink and didn't tell anyone.  So I sat through the entire dinner with wet pants and underwear and that wasn't the greatest feeling.  Not the restaurant's fault but wish they'd at least make up for a bad start with better service.  Anyway
column5: looking around all the time while we were talking and placing orders.  He forgot our wine and ketchup.  Anyway steak was good but service just wasn't what I expected.
